shows.title: Night Prayer
shows.desc:
A beautiful service of hymns, chants, psalms and readings led by St Martin’s Voices.

Singers from St Martin-in-the-Fields in London, with their Director of Music Andrew Earis.

shows.title: Great Sacred Music – The Passing of the Year
shows.desc:
St Martin’s Voices, from St Martin-in-the-Fields in London, with their Director of Music Andrew Earis, explore through word and song the passage from spring to summer, autumn to winter.

Please meet up at the Boughton House end of the great west Lawn half an hour before the performance to be led up into the Colonnades at the main House. There is no seating at the venue, so something to sit on is advisable.

The Colonnades is a beautiful setting for classical and acoustic music recital and has been used as the backdrop for many film-shoots over the years.

shows.title: Come-and-Sing Hallelujah!

Join St Martin’s Voices for a fun hour-long workshop singing Handel’s Hallelujah Chorus alongside Leonard Cohen’s Hallelujah. All welcome – no previous experience required!
